qas.question: The four law-making bodies that can affect hunting and firearm use are:
answers: Federal, provincial, municipal, and regional governments.
The FBI, The State Police, the San Francisco Police Department, and the Traffic Patrol
Animal Control Administration, BC Wildlife Federation, Municipal and regional governments
Government of Canada, Government of British Columbia, Municipal government, and The Queen

qas.question: It is Legal to hunt from an aircraft:
answers: False
True
Only fixed-wing aircraft
Only rotary-wing aircraft

qas.question: The following enforcement agencies may enforce hunting laws in BC:
answers: Conservation Officers, RCMP, Parks Rangers, Federal Fisheries Officers
Conservation Officers, RCMP, Bylaw Officers, Park rangers
Conservation Officers, Justices of the Peace, RCMP
Conservation Officers, RCMP, Park Rangers, and Town criers

qas.question: In BC, it is illegal to:
answers: Shoot wildlife from a motor vehicle or a boat propelled by a motor
Shoot wildlife from a motor vehicle when it is running
Shoot wildlife
Shoot wildlife from a motor vehicle or a bicycle

qas.question: Hunting migratory game birds requires:
answers: A Canadian Migratory Game Bird hunting permit, and a BC hunting license
A shotgun
A BC hunting license
A Canadian Migratory Game Bird hunting permit
